package:
cloud_robotics 1.0.0
The cloud_robotics package is an attempt to reduce a robot's battery consumption by moving localization computations to a remote server. It works by running AMCL on both the robot and a server, and redirecting laser scans to one of these AMCL instances based on network and processor quality.
